item.title: 4 Takeaways From the Patriots' Win Over the Ravens
item.description: The Patriots clinched a playoff berth while the Ravens fell into a potentially insurmountable hole. Here's what we learned about both teams.

item.title: Ravens QB Lamar Jackson Ruled Out Early vs. Patriots With Back Injury
item.description: The two-time MVP quarterback's health is a cause for concern after he was forced out of the Ravens' Week 16 game against the Patriots.
